item.title: Kristen Bell on Why Audiences Swoon Over That First ‘Nobody Wants This’ Kiss: ‘Comfort Can Be Incredibly Passionate’
item.description: Joanne (Kristen Bell) and Noah (Adam Brody) are back for Season 2 of “Nobody Wants This,” and the show’s cast and producers hint that there will be changes to their relationship after the Season
